Text: I won't grab this, I just wanted to thank you for going back to the mpg files 'cause they DO look better.
I'm not really going back to MPG files. I'm just uploading MPG videos that were already done before I switched to Xvid.
would you consider going back to mpeg ? as Sten1972 said, they do look better. we really do appreciate all these rare gems you share. thank you.

I made an XVID file and an MPEG file of a few videos and compared them and saw no difference in quality. The Twisted Sister video I uploaded was 119MG and it would have been over 200MG if it was an MPEG file so it's nice to have a smaller file.
Mpg does look better, please 2-na reconsider switching back to MPG. Thanks.
